title: LIVE IM 25h with Tschief, Tilmann Schanze & YVY MARAEY
description:
At „LIVE IM 25h“, the pop culture event series at the 25hours Hotel in Bikini Berlin, young artists from a wide range of disciplines meet each month.

Tschief
Sebastian Becker has been publishing short poetic and handwritten texts online under the pseudonym TSCHIEF since 2013. His handwriting has become his trademark and has set him apart from many other writers on the internet from the very beginning. More than 100,000 people now follow his writing and thoughts on Instagram.

Tilmann Schanze
The Berlin writer Tilmann Schanze (25) writes poems about everything that moves him and hits the nerve of his generation with his own style. One of his texts was aptly described as "a bit like salt in the wound. But somehow I'm into it", and that fits. At least he thinks so.


YVY MARAEY
Although Yvy Marãey grew up in Berlin as the daughter of a German mother, she never let go of her father's Brazilian culture. Together with the New Zealand guitarist and producer Simon Abela, she pursued this interest and began to combine Brazilian rhythms with contemporary R&B. Crystal clear and soulful vocals in English and Portuguese are combined with playful melodies and relaxed beats. Yvy Marãey presents herself in a light and informal manner with a mixture of European and Latin American sounds that find common roots in catchy grooves.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬● Tickets ●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Presale: 11 € - Abendkasse/Box-office: 13 €

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬● Info ●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Drum & Bass music is an integral part of the electronic music scene, and it has been gaining popularity over the years. Drum & Bass events are a great way to experience the unique and powerful energy of this genre.
The atmosphere at these events is unlike any other. The basslines thump through the air, creating a heavy, yet exciting atmosphere. Everybody is dancing enthusiastically, and it’s easy to get lost in the moment. The energy of the crowd is palpable, and it’s infectious.
The lineup at Infected Drum & Bass events is carefully curated to create a unique and memorable experience. DJs spin the hottest tracks of the moment, often mixing in some timeless classic tunes.
A Drum & Bass event is a great place to meet like-minded people and make long-lasting friendships. Everyone is there to enjoy the music and have a good time, and it’s easy to make connections with fellow music lovers.
If you’re looking for an unforgettable night out, a Drum & Bass event is the perfect option. The music, atmosphere, and people make for a party that you won’t soon forget. So come join in the fun and make some amazing memories.

title: Tausend ELECTRONICA - Ceci Fierce
description:
Ceci Fierce emerges as a rising star among Berlin-based DJs and Producers, celebrated for her inventive and vibrant House music fusions.Her musical odyssey commenced at the age of five, mastering the violin and self-teaching piano. As time unfolded, she ventured into composing classical pieces and exploring the art of DJing during her college years, setting the stage for her distinctive sound today.
Ceci's performances transcend mere music; they become immersive voyages. She effortlessly connects with her audience, guiding them through a sonic labyrinth of unexpected twists and turns, fueled by her infectious positivity. Renowned for her versatility, her sets evolve from Organic and Afro House to Melodic, Tech, and Progressive House as the night unfolds, showcasing her dynamic prowess behind the decks.
While her narrative continues to unfold, one truth remains constant: when Ceci Fierce takes the stage, ears perk up and hearts beat to her rhythm.

title: Come, let me show you around
description:
The second chapter of “Come, let me show you around” at kwia is happening on Wednesday, 22nd May. This time, our guests reflect diverse dualities, bringing together their deep-rooted heritage and the musical influences they’ve embraced along their journeys.

Date: Wednesday, May 22nd
Time: 20:30 - late

Nico Adomako is a Berlin and Accra-based trans-disciplinary artist. As co-founder of Oroko Radio and the Berlin DJ collective Einhundert, Nico has shaped the music and art scenes in Berlin and Accra. He produces events globally, from London to Tokyo. For this event, Nico shares music from Accra, Kingston, and London, reflecting his globally-minded perspective and commitment to his community.

Lawrence Lee, from New York with Korean and Brazilian roots, is based in Berlin where he founded the A7A imprint and LUSH club night. Known for releases on UMAY, Radiant Records, E-Missions, International Chrome, and Mala Junta, Lawrence will explore the meaning of home by sharing music that reflects his Korean and Brazilian heritage.

Ninafterdark is a DJ and co-founder of the collective Slipmode. Known for her genre-jumping sets that blend nostalgic edits and global club sounds, she approaches music with a non-committal attitude towards the dancefloor. At our event, Ninafterdark will share music from her Somali roots and the influences she found in London.

Luwei, the show's creator, will be conducting the event. Luwei will share sounds from Milan, her second home, from a personal perspective.

"Come, Let Me Show You Around" is a radio show dedicated to uncovering and celebrating geographically underrepresented musical landscapes from around the globe. The show is built around the concept of showcasing music that holds special significance to our guests—from the melodies of their hometowns to the sounds that have inspired them wherever they've roamed. As we explore these special musical selections, we open the floor to stories about cultural backgrounds, personal journeys, and how heritage shapes the music we love.

Amazing graphic design by @f3nk33

title: Alles Immer Wieder Releasekonzert Post Neo
description:
Post Neo
Post Neo is a Berlin based experimental electronic pop duo by Nicole Luján and Pauline Weh. Through the sound of their voices, synthesizers and drum machines, their style oscillates between techno beats and dreamy melancholic atmospheres. The musicians' different musical backgrounds result in diverse intuitions which complement each other perfectly when producing tracks. In 2022 Post Neo received a residency from Musicboard Berlin at Sternhagen Gut, where they caught the ear of Gudrun Gut who signed them to her label. Their EP "Alles Immer Wieder" was released as a 10” vinyl in April. 

Acid Drones
Acid Drones is a new recording and live project by Thomas Lea Clarke, a musician, sound artist and ex resident DJ of the Art School Club in Glasgow, now based in Berlin. The debut album by Acid Drones, released on Offen Music in September 2023, weaves together elements of ambient, dub, idm and club-focused music.

Reinartzt 
Mexican-born, rave experimentalist Reinartz (he/him) got into DJing at the old Sunday Club parties in 2018 where he developed a sensitivity to the odd sides of rave music. With multiple music releases on various DIY labels and a monthly show on Threads radio where he showcases sonic adventures of the gelatinous kind, he‘s set himself the task of fully immersing the dancer, always blending multiple styles, genres and eras with a penchant for the weird, the fast, the cosmic and the absurd.

DJ Chichi
DJ Chichi, a genre-fluid artist, serves as a Radio Host at Refuge Worldwide, captivating their audience with their versatile and innovative approach to music. As the co-founder of xcuse:u collective, they break down genre barriers and encourage collaboration among artists. In Berlin, DJ Chichi co-hosts Starseeds, a queer-friendly party series known for its inclusive atmosphere. Their seamless navigation through diverse genres and advocacy for more inclusivity and solidarity in the music industry make DJ Chichi a trailblazer, shaping the landscape of inclusive and creative spaces in the nightlife scene.

title: SEVEN SINS ... KITKAT CLUB .... THE SEXIEST PARTY IN BERLIN
description:
Step into the world of Seven Sins at KitKat Club, where the vibe is electric and every night is an adventure to remember. First ignited in 2019 from a passion project among friends, Seven Sins has evolved into a beacon of freedom and creativity in Berlin’s nightlife scene. After a brief hiatus, we celebrated our revival on July 24th, 2021, marking the birthday of our visionary leader, Sil Romero. Now, we proudly host our event every 4th Thursday of the month, starting at 22:00 in the KitKat Club’s captivating basement.

Seven Sins isn't just a party—it's a movement celebrating a sex-positive and consent-focused culture. Our mission is to create an inclusive atmosphere where all are welcome to explore and express their desires freely and safely.

What Awaits Inside:
The Cave: Dive deep into shadowy corners where secrets thrive.
Doctor Area: Indulge in your wildest medical fantasies, from dentists to doctors.
Kinky Area: Right behind the DJ booth, be seen while staying in the heart of the action.
Intimate Spaces: Encircling the dance floor, discover secluded spots for private moments.
Cage: Positioned in the center of the dance floor for those who dare to be the spectacle.
Chillout Bar: A relaxed space to chat and cool down with a drink.

title: KATER ON STAGE
description:
SHE KNOWS, the dynamic duo comprised of Spanish singer and composer TERESA TOMÁS and Brazilian composer and producer MARCEL DADALTO, known for having been a member of the Brazilian bands DEAD FISH and ZÉMARIA, takes pride in their collaborative and spontaneous approach to music production, effortlessly transcending the boundaries of electronic sub-genres. From ethereal ambient interludes to delightfully twisted and wacky synth lines, SHE KNOWS performances encapsulate the symbiotic creative synergy between the two artists.

"Nervous Bliss" is set to be released on May 17, 2024 on Bar 25 Music. In a total of eight danceable, melodic songs - four of them in Spanish and four in English - TERESA explores the different facets of a feeling we all know and seek with her unmistakably smoky voice, which sounds like a welcome, intimate, loving touch: the excited fluttering in the pit of the stomach when our nervous system is flooded with feelings of happiness. The album has been supported by Initiative Musik GmbH with project funds from the Federal Government Commissioner for Culture and Media

Active since 2014, SHE KNOWS has released music through labels such as Laut & 
Luise
, AZZUR, and Sirin Music. However, most of their creations have been released through Bar 25 Music with notable works including the EPs "Distorted Images," "Natural Medicina," and "Extraordinary," along with hit singles like "Thalassa" and "Lost in Translation". SHE KNOWS have performed featuring live percussion, VJ sessions and dance interventions at clubs and venues, such as Kater Blau, Mensch Meier, Beate Uwe, Zeiss-Planetarium Jena, Säälchen Holzmarkt, 
Yaam (FR)
 and international Festivals like Fusion, Garbicz, Loftas, Sonoras IV.

title: HYSTERIA VOX | Nu Jazz, Lord Spikeheart, Teresa Riemann
description:
‘Hysteria’, a category describing emotionally excessive behaviour, was invented to rationalize unknown disorder as early as ancient Egypt. Symptoms include tonal instability in the voice and semantic discontinuities; vocal performances that harness disruptive raw emotion and the disorder of our stream-of-conscious.
On May 22nd, Trauma Bar und Kino presents *Hysteria Vox*, a sequence of cathartic vocalities from an international array of artists. Nu Jazz (US), Lord Spikeheart (KENYA) and Teresa Riemann (GER) gather in one evening of psycho-sonic stunts with physical commitment and daring chaos.
Covering noise, punk, jazz and club tropes, expect a boundary-less musical vanguard with eruptive sonant forces. Inner-monologue projections of *Hysteria Vox*.

“the narrative voice struggles to contain, through form, the confusions of its utterance” - Claire Kahane (Passions of the Voice)


Nu Jazz
NYC’s most transgressive and mysterious supergroup, Nu Jazz, synthesizes a decade plus of six unique, yet naturally interconnected musical journeys. Some members have spent years in New York City’s experimental electronic scene, while others have dedicated the bulk of their musical lives pursuing what we call “Jazz”. Despite disparate influences, all are bound by a profound appreciation for musical frontiers that have yet to be explored, creating that which defies the limitations of genre. The artists constituting the collective “Nu Jazz” have performed all over New York City, the United States and the world with their respective groups such as Deli Girls, Murderpact, CGI Jesus, Ex Wiish, Beshken, WRENS and The Beak Triol, sharing festival stages with luminaries like Jaimie Branch, Tomoki Sanders, Leya, Poncili Creacíon, Aquiles Navarro of Irreversible Entanglements and many others. Their debut record “Vol. I” combines the sound of NYC electronic hardcore, unrestrained free improvisation, and sample based modular synthesis techniques influenced by featured collaborator and keyboardist Jason Lindner of Bowie’s “Blackstar Orchestra”. Vast electronic soundscapes, extraterrestrial vocal textures and open improvisation submerged in raw punk swagger sets Nu Jazz apart from the rest.
Members:
Dan Orlowski [Deli Girls] on vocals
Kevin Eichenberger [The Beak Trio/CGI Jesus] on bass
John Bemis [Murderpact] on drums
Ben Shirken [Beshken/Ex Wiish] on electronics
Ryan Easter [Wrens/The Trap Music Orchestra] on trumpet
Adam Turay [The Narcotix] on Guitar

Lord Spikeheart
Kenyan vocalist, lyricist and producer Lord Spikeheart, best known as the live wire frontman of the electro-dystopian grind band DUMA, has announced his debut album The Adept via TVYM, first official single that The Fader Magazine describes as “a thrashing industrial cut, with Khanja’s possessed barks and hellacious roars set to a bruising beat by Japanese producer Saionji BBBBBBB that attacks from all angles”.
Building bridges between the African heavy music, and the international electronic and metal scenes, Lord Spikeheart has made a name for himself as a formidable force in the game pushing back genre categories and stretching limits to the extreme.
The debut solo LP The Adept will be released on his own imprint Hekalu on April 19th. For this new joint he hooks up with various producers and artists from the bass n’ shred universe and promises to bring a telluric big bang in sonic experimentation.

Teresa Riemann
Teresa Riemann (*1988 in Dachau) lives and works as a performance-artist, musician (compositions / improvisations: drums, piano, voice) and writer since 2012 in Berlin. Since 2010 she has been organizing and staging numerous concerts, readings and performances from Poland to Tunisia. Forging an outlet via the Berlin Noise scene, she explores the light in the shadows of subconsciousness in an endurance performance of solo drum madness, intriguing vocals and effects. 
A mesmerizing combination of convulsive percussion and trembling noise walls, the almost exploding landscapes are being held together by the eclectic use of a fragmented voice, spontaneously reciting scraps of the living memory of humankind.
Aside from her solo projects on drums and piano she plays in the groups Naked in the Zoo, TRAS and Shake the Train.

title: Meet & Greet Berlin
description:
Loose Club Edition, invites you to its meet & greet at the Berlin Dance Music Event 2024. Join us at Dream Baby Dream Bar on the 23rd of May, from 7 PM to 1 AM, for an unforgettable gathering of music enthusiasts and industry professionals. This event is generously sponsored by The IMPF Network Project, a Creative Europe Programme.

Meet us and our artists including Ritzi Lee, DE FEO, Pooja B, Glia and Wow Signal. Our team members will be on hand to provide insights and advice, making it the perfect opportunity to dance to some amazing DJ sets and expand your industry knowledge.

Attendance is free, but due to the limited capacity of the venue, we require registration via Eventbrite to ensure your entry. The DJs playing at the event will be available to socialise and share their expertise with attendees before and after their performances.

Don’t miss the DEMO DROP session with our A&R, Ritzi Lee. It’s an ideal chance to receive honest feedback from industry professionals or perhaps even secure a signing with Unrilis or Loose Club Editon, as we are constantly in search of fresh talent. Additionally, you can book industry-focused chats about topics such as music rights, royalties, and label management.

Given the intimate setting of the venue, we recommend arriving early to secure a spot at the welcome cocktail from 7pm till 9pm.

We look forward to welcoming you to Berlin, especially if you are a DJ or producer eager to gain insights and advice about the electronic music industry. Join us for a night of networking, music, and learning at the Berlin Dance Music Event 2024.

title: Recycle & Berlin Dance Music Event presents: NEOSIGNAL BERLIN ft. Phace, Simula, Rockwell
description:
Neosignal: Von Komplettabriss bis hin zu detailverliebten Cutting-Edge-Soundexperimenten jenseits des Mainstream.

Am 24.05. erscheint via Deadbeat die neue LP "Everyday" von Phace, und am selben Tag kommt er mit einer Neosignal-Labelnacht ins Gretchen. Das Album fasst seine Klangabenteuer der letzten zwei Jahre zusammen und vermischt Stile und Vibes, um Gewohnheiten zu durchbrechen. Phace kennt man seit seinem düster-unterkühlten Debüt "Psycho", einem Hi-Speed D&B-Massaker mit Industrial-Sounds, shuffelnden Drumlines und tiefen Bässen. Konstantes Touren und unerschöpfliches Produzieren für Top-Labels wie Owsla, Vision, Mau5trap und Critical hielten ihn nicht davon ab, zusammen mit Misanthrop das Label Neosignal zu gründen. Neosignal steht seitdem für futuristisches State-of-the-Art-Sounddesign vom Feinsten, und seitdem ist das Label bei uns regelmäßig zu Gast, immer mit einem fein kuratierten Line-Up.

Simula ist seit 2015 in der elektronischen Musik unterwegs. Mit einer Kombination von Elementen aus Jungle, Jump Up und einer Vielzahl von Stilen aus der Soundsystem-Kultur treibt er die dunkle und düstere Seite des Drum'n'Bass voran.

Ebenfalls für neue Formen zuständig ist Rockwell, der auf seinem Debütalbum "Obsolete Medium" (2015) Elemente aus Drum & Bass, Trap, Halftime und Technoklängen zu elastischen Hybridformen verwebt hat. Er veröffentlichte unter anderem bei Shogun Audio, bevor er 2018 mit der "Content"-EP sein Label Obsolete Medium startete. Sein letztes Album "Low Art" (2023) ist inspiriert vom amerikanischen Hardcore-Punk und bringt einen organischeren Sound und eine raue DIY-Attitüde mit.

Hinter Erotic Cafe' verbirgt sich der italienische Produzent Marco Donnarumma, der Footwork, Drum'n'Bass und weitere Stile erforscht und über die Jahre einen umfassenden Katalog in einer Vielzahl von Genres aufgebaut hat. Er steht für die dunkle, harte und experimentelle Seite des Drum'n'Bass, die sich nicht davor scheut, sich von vielen Genres infizieren zu lassen.

N'Dee, Yoru, MC Jamie White und Rollin MC runden den Spaß in der Box1 ab. In Box2 tummelt sich die Deviate-Crew und widmet sich dem Brückenschlag zwischen verschiedenen Stilen der Bassmusik und anderer Electronica.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.
________

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

title: DUALISM w/ EARGASM GOD, DJ Traytex, Alex.Do, SACID
Bender party VOL. III
description:
Bender Party is back and this time at a new home, bigger, better, and more BENDER than ever for our third edition. 

This time, we're doubling the excitement with not one, but two special guests and an unforgettable drag show by the iconic Judy Ladivina together with the stunning Sara Lu. Together, they will warm up the atmosphere easing us into an eclectic night of hedonism and excess. 

Taking care of the transition from the cozy drag show vibes to the pumping music journey of the night will be the party founder, Spino. If you've been with us before, you know the drill. Expect nothing less than the finest vinyl selection of sexy techno tracks that will get your hips shaking, your heart racing, and your mind thoroughly blown.

Following up we will have Oneyra taking control of the booth. This young, Irish-born, and Berlin-based talent will draw you in with her distinctive sound—think groovy basslines, gut-wrenching kicks, and atmospheric synths. Oneyra's set promises to be a hand-held journey into a night you'll always remember.

Then, taking over the decks, we welcome back our beloved resident, Mr. Willis. Fresh from an Asian tour, he's primed to dominate the dance floor during peak time. Immerse yourself in his signature sound, a blend that promises to be a sensual auditory journey, leaving you craving more.

To cap off the night, we're thrilled to host the sonic innovator, Controle Delete. A long-standing figure in Berlin's music scene, known for his integration of noisy, industrial, and experimental elements with irresistibly sexy and groovy basslines. He's concocting an EXTRA SEXY set, ensuring you leave with your auditory senses delighted and your legs thoroughly worked out.

Prepare for a night where music, energy, and memories collide—only at Bender Party's. Get ready to dance, feel, and experience the unforgettable.

Line up: 
Doors open at 23:30 
Drag show 00.00 

SP!NO
Oneyra
Mr. Willis
Control Delete

As always our beloved Space Exhile will be complementing the sonic journey with one of his spectacular laser installation. 

Bender is a safe space for the 2SLGBTQIA+ community, customers, performers, and staff. Bender is a place that challenges gender norms, celebrating beauty in all its shapes and forms. We invite participants to express themselves in the way they prefer, without fear of negative comments. We encourage all our guests to unleash their inner child and revel in the joy of partying in a judgment-free zone.

In these historical times, as transgender individuals and drag performers face increased hate and politically unjustified, fear-based persecution, we invite all transgender individuals, crossdressers, and drag queen performers to join us in a space where they will be celebrated. Therefore, we will implement the following format during queue management at all our Benders:

FULL DRAG ROYALTY PASS -
Step into the spotlight and own the night! If you're decked out in full drag – complete with dramatic makeup, extravagant outfits, sky-high heels, and fabulous wigs – you'll receive the royal treatment. Skip the queue and enter with a donation fee. Show up, show off, and shine!

CROSSDRESSING EXPRESS LANE -
For those who embrace the art of crossdressing and our transgender-identifying guests, we offer a special privilege! Skip the queue and step directly into the heart of the party. It's about genuine effort and embracing your true self – with outfits and accessories that defy gender norms.

The dress code is the same as always: avoid streetwear and "Dress to impress or undress to express, in outfits that dazzle and never depress.'' Erotic and leather outfits are highly encouraged. On this occasion, we will also have the fabulous George Kanis as official photographer of the night. 
Our door selection reserves the right to refuse entry if deemed necessary.

title: Shameless/Limitless: Bad Hammer EP Release + Mustelide
description:
Let’s be real: Bad Hammer rock, and their new self titled EP does so especially hard. It’s got front to back hits (Angel No 1, It’s You, Green Flash - all career highlights, all available here) and it pulls off the feat of offering instant gratification while also proving to be more rewarding with repeated listening. It’s the highly refined shadow pop you’ve come to know and love from the band, in pristine, perfect form. Like yeah, aber hallooo, duh, it’s Bad Hammer, we all knew they had it in em. Now it’s here.

On May 23 at 8MM, S/L will present the duo live in concert to celebrate the EP’s release. The show will also feature feature special guest Mustelide, the project of Minsk transplant, BH collaborator and active-in-local-scene artist Natallia Kunitskaya.

P come.

title: BITE NITE
locationText: 70 Am Wriezener Bahnhof; Friedrichshain; 10243 Berlin; Germany
description:
Dystopische Cyberpunk-Ästhetik trifft auf unterkühlten Synthwave, maskuline Electronic Body Music, Italo und Techno - mit BITE hat Phase Fatale seit 2018 eine Plattform für Musiker*innen geschaffen, die das Erbe der 80er Jahre mit den Produktionsmethoden von heute fortschreiben. Für die BITE Nite auf beiden Floors hat Phase Fatale, der heute zusammen mit Pablo Bozzi unter ihrem Italo-Body-Projektnamen Soft Crash auflegen wird, sowohl Label-Acts wie Unhuman als auch befreundete DJs wie The Hacker eingeladen. Schwefelgelb ist ein Berliner Techno-Duo, das seit Anfang der 2000er Jahre aktiv ist und mit seiner Dahinter Das Gesicht EP 2017 einen Genre- Klassiker auf dem Label aufnahme + wiedergabe veröffentlicht hat. Ihre energiegeladenen Live- Sets werden von Bewusstsein verändernden Stroboskopgewittern befeuert. Ebenfalls live dabei ist der kolumbianische Produzent Faunes Efe alias Filmmaker. Seine rauen Post-Punk meets EBM-Tracks hat er auf Labels wie Opal Tapes und Veyl veröffentlicht.

Dystopian cyberpunk aesthetics meet chilled synthwave, masculine EBM, Italo and techno – since 2018, Hayden Payne aka Phase Fatale has been running BITE as a platform for musicians who continue the legacy of the 80s with the production methods of today. For the BITE Night on both floors, Payne will be DJing with Pablo Bozzi under their Italo body music alias Soft Crash along with label acts such as Unhuman as well as DJ friends such as The Hacker. Active since the early 00s, Schwefelgelb is a Berlin techno duo who released a classic on the label aufnahme + wiedergabe in 2017 with their Dahinter Das Gesicht EP. Their energetic live sets are fueled by storms of mind-altering strobelight. Also performing live is Colombian producer Faunes Efe aka Filmmaker, who has released his raw post-punk-meets-EBM tracks on labels such as Opal Tapes and Veyl.

title: Berlin Dance Music Event 2024
description: The Berlin Dance Music Event is a multi-day gathering for the electronic music industry. With the Gathering Event, an educational and influential platform is created, in which the new generation of artists and professionals of electronic music, can be inspired and work on their personal development. In addition, the event offers high-quality contributions to current topics of the scene and is also an ideal place for networking established players in the industry.

title: [IL]LEGAL w/ Xenia, Amstra & Marco Leckbert
description:
[IL]LEGAL is back. 

After a longer break and a few changes behind the scenes, it’s finally time again for unforgettable nights, first-class sound, insane vibes, and dancing until you drop!

For our comeback, we have the best hard-hitting and driving sound with our headliners XENIA, AMSTRA and MARCO LECKBERT. 
Hot support comes from the Berlin underground with CØNFIDÆNCE, LISA LOCA, and LULI PANASCI. 

This time our second floor will be hosted by KNOCK KNOCK.
KNOCK KNOCK is a Berlin-based collective of musicians and creative minds focused on spreading their philosophy through beats, sounds and movement. 
They stand for an open-minded community where everyone is welcome, and where human connection is the key to share love and good vibrations.
     
On this evening, KNOCK KNOCK presents a lineup for the Second Floor featuring artists such as DJBOUNTY3000, NIØ b2b OTG, DJ ORDNUNGSAMT, and VANILLA THUNDER, offering a mix of trance and bouncy hard trance for a great variety. 

Additionally, they’ll kick off with an open-air event in the new outdoor area of the COMPLEX at 20:00 where DJP will set the stage for an unforgettable night.

Get ready for a rave of superlatives! 

Get ready for the new round of [IL]LEGAL!


-	We do not tolerate any kind of homo- & transphobia, racism & sexism!

title: [CANCELLED] Ilhan Ersahin's Istanbul Sessions
description:
CANCELLED!
Due to Visa issues, musicians will not be able to travel for this concert. We apologize for this change! All purchased tickets can be returned!





Frontman Ilhan Ersahin is one of those rare moguls of the New York City underground scene via his club and record label, Nublu, and he’s spread his New York energy throughout the world. It’s possible to see him jamming with The Red Hot Chili Peppers in Sao Paolo, or featuring Bugge Wesseltoft in Blue Note Tokyo or playing a beautiful oriental set with Turkish gypsies in an elegant concert hall somewhere in Europe.

Since 2008 they have set fire to stages all across the world : from New York to Istanbul, from Paris to Sao Paolo, from London to Skopje… A session is a meeting of a deliberative body to conduct its business. In this case, the business is music, and the music is another heavyweight offering from Ilhan and his crew. Above all, the Istanbul Sessions can aptly be described as cinematic.

title: claire rousay + Jules Reidy
description:
silent green presents: Claire Rousay masterfully incorporates textural found sounds, sumptuous drones and candid field recordings into music that celebrates the beauty in life’s banalities. Sentiment symbolizes a meditation on the emotional landscapes of loneliness, nostalgia, sentimentality, guilt and sex. The album’s narrative arc is guided by delicate musical gestures and artistic vulnerability, audaciously synthesizing disparate and unexpected influences. 

Jules Reidy composes music for processed and acoustic instruments, especially guitars.


Friday, 24. May
silent green Kuppelhalle
Doors: 7 pm / Start: 8 pm

title: Art Bei Ton x Semantica
description:
Art Bei Ton x Semantica
Thu. 23.05.24. at ://about blank

For this very special occasion, we have the honor to invite the legendary label Semantica for a unique night of Deep Techno and trippy visuals!

We're delighted to bring to Berlin the great DJ, producer, and Semantica label owner Svreca for some trippy mental techno sounds. We'll also have the pleasure to hear the talented Georgian artist Irakli, as well as a special trancy B2B closing set from Hypnotic Black Magic together with amazing DJ Clarisse. Our dear resident Andrea Cossu will open the celebration with some immersive Hypnotic Techno sounds.

Spring is here, and we very much look forward to coming back to the concept of 2 floors - 2 vibes! Expect some driving sonic journeys in the tent, from Breaky sounds to more uplifting music. Find here the talented DJ and producer Mordio, as well as the great Italian artist Ludovica Frauu.

Art Bei Ton meaning 'Art Through Music', we want to bring our guests to explore an immersive experience with the glitchy futuristic VJing from Rahul Sharma on the MDF floor, as well as our video exhibition 'A Wild Trip'.

Svreca (Semantica, Spain)

UNITY is a vibrant community of free spirits who seek to connect with their souls and bodies in a respectful, sexy, and playful manner. We have created a space where you can bring your fantasies to life and anticipate high-quality lineups, ranging from uptempo trance/neotrance to uptempo techno, providing a diverse musical experience for all.
